text: Vicente Garcia Salmeron (born January 9, 1970 in Granada) is a skier from Spain. He has a disability: he is blind and is a type B1 skier. He raced at the 1994 Winter Paralympics in para-alpine skiing. He was the second skier to finish in the super giant race. == References == Category:Spanish skiers Category:Living people Category:1962 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Madrid Category:1994 Winter Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B1
